manageExistingSolutions.manageExistingSo:
**Functional Purpose**: Section heading for managing comments on existing solutions.
**UI Location**: Settings → Comments Preference Form → Manage Existing Solutions (section heading).
**When Users See This**: When viewing the comments preference settings and there are published solutions.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Manage existing solutions"
manageExistingSolutions.allowCommentsOnE:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to enable comments on all existing published solutions.
**UI Location**: Settings → Comments Preference Form → Manage Existing Solutions (button).
**When Users See This**: When viewing the comments preference settings and not all published solutions have comments enabled.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Allow comments on all existing solutions"
manageExistingSolutions.disableCommentsO:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to disable comments on all existing published solutions.
**UI Location**: Settings → Comments Preference Form → Manage Existing Solutions (button).
**When Users See This**: When viewing the comments preference settings and at least one published solution has comments enabled.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Disable comments on all existing solutions"
